title: Muscle Oxygen Saturation

smo2.description: ReadOnly, SMO2(Muscle Oxygen Saturation). It is the percentage of hemoglobin that is carrying oxygen in muscle tissue.

observedtime.description: ReadOnly, An ISO8601 format time indicating when the data is observed (ex: 2016-02-15T09:19Z)
